content: inside one space and if you don t just make some slip_stitch to reach next space insert a nice string into round 24 s holes ch2 single_crochet ch1 *single_crochet ch1 single_crochet ch1* in next space you can make it with a lucet my favourite with repeat from * to *3 more times 20sts chain stitch crochet with an i-cord or just take one from an old shoe round 3 ch2 * single_crochet ch1 single_crochet ch1 in next space single_crochet ch1 in next space* repeat from * to *3 more take beautiful pictures of your work it deserves it times single_crochet ch1 single_crochet ch1 in next space slip_stitch start another one in other colors into the initial ch2 30sts round 4 ch2 * single_crochet ch1 single_crochet ch1 in next space single_crochet ch1 in next space single_crochet ch1 in next space * repeat pattern copyright © lusianne the pattern is for unlimited personal and non commercial use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern
